{"id":1264541207,"question_id":2915,"lang":"java","lang_name":"Java","time":"3Â weeks","timestamp":1716350955,"status":10,"status_display":"Accepted","runtime":"43 ms","url":"/submissions/detail/1264541207/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"Count of Interesting Subarrays","memory":"67.3 MB","code":"class Solution {\n    public long countInterestingSubarrays(List<Integer> nums, int modulo, int k) {\n        HashMap<Integer, Integer> map = new HashMap<>();\n        long res = 0;\n        int cnt = 0;\n        map.put(0, 1);\n\n        for (int n : nums) {\n            if (n % modulo == k) {\n                cnt++;\n            }\n            \n            res += map.getOrDefault((cnt-k+modulo)%modulo, 0);\n            map.put(cnt%modulo, map.getOrDefault(cnt%modulo, 0)+1);\n            \n        }\n\n        return res;\n    }\n}","compare_result":"","title_slug":"count-of-interesting-subarrays","has_notes":false,"flag_type":1}
